mapper.select: select MPSNO, PROCESSNO, SEQUENCENO, MACHINENO, SCHEDULEDSTARTTIME, SCHEDULEDENDTIME, ACTUALSTARTTIME, ACTUALENDTIME, STATUS from PROCESS
select MPSNo from MPS where Status = '在加工' or Status = '待加工'
select SequenceNo from process where trim(mpsno)=#{mpsno}

select.if: select NewSensorData.mpsno as "mpsno" ,taskno as "taskno" ,NewSensorData.processno as "processno" , NewSensorData.endtime as "endtime" , to_char(to_date('8:00:00','hh24:mi:ss')+GAParallel.endtime/24/60/60,'hh24:mi:ss') as "planendtime" ,NewSensorData.status as "status" from NewSensorData ,GAParallel where NewSensorData.processno in (select max(cast(processno as int)) from NewSensorData group by mpsno) and NewSensorData.mpsno=GAParallel.mpsno and NewSensorData.processno=GAParallel.processno and GAParallel.starttime is not null order by NewSensorData.mpsno

select NewSensorData.mpsno, taskno, NewSensorData.processno, NewSensorData.endtime, to_char(to_date('8:00:00', 'hh24:mi:ss') + GAParallel.endtime / 24 / 60 / 60, 'hh24:mi:ss') PlanEndTime, round(to_number(to_date(NewSensorData.recorddate || NewSensorData.endtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - (to_date(NewSensorData.recorddate || '8:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') + GAParallel.endtime / 24 / 60 / 60)) * 24 * 60) DelayTime from NewSensorData, GAParallel where NewSensorData.processno in (select max(processno) from NewSensorData group by mpsno) and NewSensorData.mpsno = GAParallel.mpsno and NewSensorData.processno = GAParallel.processno and GAParallel.starttime is not null and round(to_number(to_date(NewSensorData.recorddate || NewSensorData.endtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - (to_date('2019-3-2 8:00:00', 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') + GAParallel.endtime / 24 / 60 / 60)) * 24 * 60) > #{delaytime} order by NewSensorData.mpsno

mapper.select: select distinct MPSNO from MPS order by MPSNO
